00007 BW_CB_pdf_class::BW_CB_pdf_class(RooRealVar& invMass_, TString name, TString title):

00011   deltaM("\\Delta m",   "Bias",  -1.452, -35, 10, "GeV/c^{2}"),
00012   sigma(  "\\sigma_{CB}","Width", 2.14, 0.,  10.0, "GeV/c^{2}"),
00013   cut(    "\\alpha",     "Cut",   1.424, 0.01, 5.0),
00014   power(  "\\gamma",     "Power", 1.86, 0.5, 100.0),
00015

00043 std::pair<double, double> BW_CB_pdf_class::GetDeltaM(void){
00044   return std::make_pair(deltaM.getVal(), deltaM.getError());
00045 }  
00046 
00047 std::pair<double, double> BW_CB_pdf_class::GetWidth(void){
00048   return std::make_pair(sigma.getVal(), sigma.getError());
00049 }
00050 
00051 std::pair<double, double> BW_CB_pdf_class::GetDeltaM(RooFitResult *fitres){
00052   RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) fitres->floatParsFinal().find(deltaM.GetName());
00053   if(var == NULL) var=&deltaM;
00054   
00055   return std::make_pair(var->getVal(), var->getError());
00056 }  
00057 
00058 std::pair<double, double> BW_CB_pdf_class::GetWidth(RooFitResult *fitres){
00059   RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) fitres->floatParsFinal().find(sigma.GetName());
00060   if(var == NULL) var = &sigma;
00061   return std::make_pair(var->getVal(), var->getError());
00062 }
00063 
00064 void BW_CB_pdf_class::SetFitType(int _fit_type){
00065   switch(_fit_type){
00066   case 0: // all floating
00067     std::cout << "[INFO] All parameters floating" << std::endl;
00068     cut.setConstant(kFALSE);
00069     power.setConstant(kFALSE);
00070     break;
00071   case 1: // fixed tail
00072     cut.setConstant();
00073     power.setConstant();
00074     break;
00075   default:
00076     cut.setConstant();
00077     power.setConstant();
00078     break;
00079   }
00080   return;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void BW_CB_pdf_class::InitFitValues(void){
00084   power.setVal(1.86);
00085   cut.setVal(1.424);
00086   deltaM.setVal(-1.452);
00087   sigma.setVal(2.14);
00088   return;
00089 }
